body.para:
You might also try a post in the Linux forums to see if anyone else has
attempted this: http://forums1.itrc.hp.com/service/forums/categoryhome.do?categoryId=15 ...AFAIK it's a Winputer....
Have you tried to just PXE it and see what happens?

quote.quotepara: -----Original Message----- From: nahant-list-bounces@redhat.com on behalf of mohammed saif Sent: Sat 5/12/2007 8:35 AM To: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 (Nahant) Discussion List Subject: Re: Hello
thnx for help i searched there but i didnt find anything, i hope if someone has an idea about how to do that
